Analyze air quality from U.S. Environmental Protection Agency

##Intro

In this activity, we analyze air quality data collected by the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency. We will use a spreadsheet of Columbus pollutants to track PM2.5 levels and understand the Air Quality Index (AQI) over time

## Links to data

* [Air Quality System(AQS)](https://www.epa.gov/outdoor-air-quality-data/download-daily-data)
* [Download All Air Quality Data (CSV)](./air-quality_all.csv)
* [Download Columbus Pollutants Data (CSV)](./columbus-pollutants.csv)
